wordGroup: lifelong learning 终身学习；终生学习
lifelong education 终身教育；终生教育

sentences.en: It had been her lifelong ambition.
sentences.cn: 这是她终身追求的目标。

sentences.en: Her lifelong dream was to be a famous writer.
sentences.cn: 她的毕生愿望就是成为名作家。

sentences.en: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream.
sentences.cn: 建一座哥伦布纪念碑一直是他一生的梦想。
